JOB DESCRIPTION:
Musikaar is seeking an engineer to join its highly skilled engineering team. The job involves doing development of tools,  automation framework and scripts using various technologies to bridge the gap between QA & Development team

Primary Responsibilities:

At least 2-3 year hands-on experience in programming using Python
Networking: Proficient in Windows CLI & troubleshoot network connection issue and provide in-depth details of issue
Performance Monitor: Measure system performance of various system counters like network,  memory,  CPU,  HDD
Scripting : Advanced Windows Batch/ PowerShell knowledgeNice to have skills:

Agile Methodology Understanding
Wireshark : CreateRecord a custom Capture file based on IP,  Port or FQDN
Apache JMeter exposure
Bash Scripting
Experience in troubleshooting using XCode,  WinDbg
Experience in performance capturing on Windows/ Linux/ OSX platform
Advanced Excel (For Analysis of data)
Verbal and written Communication
